Description:
- Minimum of 5 years Dynamics AX/D365 Trade and Logistics experience and Finance Domain
- Minimum of 5 years Dynamics AX/ D365 implementations experience.
- Strong knowledge in Finance and Costing in ERP.
- Strong industry experience within Supply Chain or Materials Management including but not limited to:
o Inventory and Warehouse Management
o Procurement and Sourcing
o Product Information Management
- Working knowledge of industry-specific best practices
- Excellent communication, planning and organization skills
- Strong customer relationship skills
- Ability to establish priorities and work independently
- Associate or bachelor's degree in Computer Science, commerce, or a closely related field, or equivalent experience required
- A proven track record of developing and implementing new business process in ERP system.
- Strong written and verbal communication skills and a collaborative attitude are a mustJob Details
